programme.title: Amber's Descent
programme.desc: After surviving a violent encounter, renowned pianist, Amber Waltz, relocates to a rural farmhouse to complete her latest symphony. When the music mysteriously begins writing itself, Amber slowly discovers that this piece could be her last.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 1
programme.desc: Documentary web series about unexplained mysteries, urbanl egends and unsolved cases originating and/or trending on the internet.

programme.title: Automation
programme.desc: A workplace robot, AUTO, transforms into a killing machine when he discovers he will be replaced by a more efficient model.

programme.title: The Wave
programme.desc: When Frank goes out on the town to celebrate a promotion, he is dosed with a hallucinogen that changes his life forever.

programme.title: The Night Eats The World
programme.desc: After waking up in an apartment the night after a raging party, Sam comes face to face with his new reality, an army of zombies have invaded the streets of Paris and he is the lone survivor. Petrified with fear, he barricades himself inside the building to survive. He wonders how long can he last in silence and solitude, and the answer comes when he learns that hes not all alone after all.

programme.title: Villmark Asylum
programme.desc: A crew of five hazardous waste workers are sent to a massive, abandoned sanatorium deep in the mountains. But their routine assignment takes a dark turn when they encounter the building’s terrifying past.

programme.title: Cannibals and Carpet Fitters
programme.desc: A group of carpet fitters are sent on a job to an old country house in the middle of nowhere. They soon discover it is a trap set up by a savage, cannibalistic family. The carpet fitters are forced to fight for their lives or risk ending up being the evenings dinner. Cannibals and Carpet Fitters is a gruesomely fun thrill ride that will keep you in your seat until the very last minute.

programme.title: Amber's Descent
programme.desc: After surviving a violent encounter, renowned pianist, Amber Waltz, relocates to a rural farmhouse to complete her latest symphony. When the music mysteriously begins writing itself, Amber slowly discovers that this piece could be her last.

programme.title: Dread The Unsolved Season 2
programme.desc: From the mysterious mutilation of the black dahlia up to the 2017 Delphi murders, no stone is left unturned in Dread: The Unsolved; A mysterious docuseries from Dread Central.

programme.desc: A workplace robot, AUTO, transforms into a killing machine when he discovers he will be replaced by a more efficient model.

programme.title: Villmark Asylum
programme.desc: A crew of five hazardous waste workers are sent to a massive, abandoned sanatorium deep in the mountains. But their routine assignment takes a dark turn when they encounter the building’s terrifying past.

programme.title: Midnight
programme.desc: A serial killer ruthlessly hunts down a deaf woman after she witnesses his brutal crime.

programme.title: Tainted
programme.desc: An ex-con with ties to the Russian mob and Aryan brotherhood yearns to escape his past life of violence but ultimately decides to undertake one last assignment to escape the Russian mob and earn his freedom.
